title: Embroidered Picture Frame, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in tent and half cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Picture fram with scalloped top.  Biblical scenes including the story of Abraham on border.  Justice in a medallion at top.  Central portion filled in later with the figures of two women.  The lower case initials l.l. are at bottom.  Difference in size of background stitches indicates work was done at two different times. Unfinished.
